nodes.description: Stream audio and video into your Gabber flow
Outputs audio and video to the end user
Manages conversation context for language models
Stores and manages conversation context messages
Automatically converts data between compatible types

value.value:
# Subgraphs
### Subgraphs are single nodes that represent multiple nodes. You can use subgraphs to condense your complex graphs, or create reusable workflows you can use across your apps.

nodes.description: A comment node for adding notes and documentation to your graph

value.value: ### In this case our subgraph ingests Audio + an LLM context, and outputs speech audio, as well as a user_message and assistant_message.

nodes.description: A comment node for adding notes and documentation to your graph

value.value: ### We are constructing our LLM context using a system message as well as the user_message and assistant_message created by our subgraph.

nodes.description: A comment node for adding notes and documentation to your graph
